item.description:
Great way to meet and dine at Golden Irene after Labor Day weekend. Golden Irene is mix of Italian, Greek and American. The place is comfortable and good atmosphere. The staffs are friendly and it also has bar.

They also have a groupon discounts going on and you can find details here http://www.groupon.com/deals/golden-irenes-restaurant-1.

The restaurant's site is http://www.goldenirenes.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Two days before meetup will share my number to those who RSVP Yes.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group
